Item ID1161

An adamant full helm is a full helmet made out of adamant. It can be worn with at least level 30 in Defence and can be smithed with at least level 77 Smithing using 2 adamantite bars (this grants 125 Smithing experience). These helms are stronger than mithril full helms but weaker than rune full helms.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+19+21+16-1+19
 Other bonusesSlot

An '''adamant full helm''' is a full helmet made out of [[adamant]]. It can be worn with at least level 30 in [[Defence]] and can be smithed with at least level 77 [[Smithing]] using 2 [[adamantite bar]]s (this grants 125 Smithing [[experience]]). These helms are stronger than [[mithril full helm]]s but weaker than [[rune full helm]]s.
